title: stuck in game
body:
i won a raked game
went to see my LP and it hadn't updated
same with my match history
 so i restarted client and when i logged on had the reconnect to game button
 but there is nothing to reconnect to
 i went to oce.op.gg and the game isn't in my match history and it doesn't say i am currently in a game ...
 help

this has also happened with my second account straight after so it isn't a singular occurrence

replies.body: Was just stuck in the champ select and everyone had locked in, game was about to begin, never did, 2 people reconnected and got back into chat, i tried to reconnect and now i login it asks me to reconnect to the game in progress, but if i click reconnect nothing happens - now i guess i get to enjoy the leaver buster queue on the house.
